DESCRIPTION: Create a roleset on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: A roleset will make sure that a user can not have more than 1 role in that set. For example, if you have roles like regional roles for your games servers. You can create a roleset to make sure that a user can not have more than one of those regional roles at any time.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}rolesetcreate [Name] [@Role | Role ID | Role Name]** ~ Create a roleset on this server. *Role names with spaces should be provided with their role id. To get the role id, use the {{prefix}}roleinfo command.*
EXISTS: **{{name}}** is already taken by another roleset. If you are trying to edit the roleset, use **rolesetadd** or **rolesetremove** commands. If you are trying to create another roleset, please provide a unique name.
CREATED: The roleset has been created on this server.
